entry.title: Comparing Node.js Frameworks: Express, Hapi, LoopBack, Sailsjs and Meteor
entry.content: I have found a great video explaining various framework pros and cons and which might be suitable for various product.This is opinianated anyway.So it is strictly a general comparison.
